name: Creem 1.0
tagline: Split SaaS revenue with partners, sell without headaches
description: Smooth payments for SaaS ü§ù Split revenue with partners anywhere. üåç Get paid in 80+ currencies, 100+ countries & stablecoins. ü§ñ AI assistant that knows your business data. üí≥ Sell with subscriptions & one-time payments without Tax headaches.

name: Draw A Fish
tagline: Draw a fish, and watch it swim with the world
description: Draw a fish and watch it swim in the global tank with everyone else's fish. Create, share, and vote on fish drawings.

name: Jotform Instagram Agent
tagline: Auto-replies for Instagram DMs, comments, and stories
description: Instagram Agent auto-replies to DMs, comments, and story replies in your voice. It uses your knowledge base to answer FAQs, supports any language, and logs everything in your AI Agent inbox. Built to scale your engagement without hiring a team.

name: Pikto AI Studio
tagline: One AI suite to replace all your design tools
description: Most AI image tools solve just one problem. Pikto AI Studio streamlines your entire design workflow‚Äîgenerate, edit, and enhance images in one seamless platform. Create eye-catching, professional visuals with ease‚Äîno design skills needed.

name: Tasker Builder
tagline: Build your idea from prompt to product to pipeline
description: Vibe code your app and find users. Easily prompt your way to a working app, power it with Google Sheets database, and connect every user action to a network of AI agents to handle market research, customer outreach, analytics, and fundraising for you.

name: Graphite Chat
tagline: The agentic code review experience.
description: Graphite Chat is your agentic code reviewer, built right into every pull request. It has full context on your entire codebase to explain diffs, suggest improvements, generate tests, or fix failing CI‚Äîand commit the changes instantly. Free while in beta.

name: TaskWand
tagline: From words to workflows in seconds
description: Never spend hours building n8n workflows again. Describe your automation, get instant results. Complete workflows with conditions, loops, and error handling - ready to deploy in seconds.

name: AIBI Pocket
tagline: Your pocket-sized AI pet companion
description: Meet AIBI Pocket, a tiny AI companion that fits in your hand or attaches to your shirt. It recognizes you, chats with ChatGPT, rotates like a gimbal, shows weather with fun animations, provides reminders, and even plays with other AIBIs.

name: Tokyo
tagline: Tracking AI usage and cost by customer
description: Advanced AI toolkit for tracking and analyzing user interactions across multiple clients. Streamline your AI operations with our comprehensive monitoring solution.

name: Vibe Annotations
tagline: 10x your vibe-coding workflow writing visual annotations
description: Visual annotation tool for AI coding agents like Claude Code, Cursor, GitHub Copilot, and Windsurf. Drop feedbacks on your localhost website and let AI implement all changes automatically via the companion MCP. Free chrome extension for designers / developers.

name: Cake AI Resume Checker
tagline: Turn applications into interviews with confidence.
description: Cake AI Resume Checker helps job seekers improve their resumes based on real job descriptions. With in-context editing and ATS-focused feedback, you can optimize your resume‚Äîand generate a matching cover letter‚Äîin minutes.

name: FlowStack
tagline: Tasks. Focus. Routines. All in one simple app
description: Instead of juggling everything at once, FlowStack lets you stack your tasks sequentially and use timers to stay focused on each one. It‚Äôs like time-blocking, but more flexible. It keeps you accountable to do the tasks you set out to do.

name: Doksy
tagline: Turn your readme into beautiful documentation website
description: Doksy helps you transform GitHub README files into clean, professional documentation websites in just a few clicks. Simple, fast, and customizable.

name: Der Die Das 2.0
tagline: The fastest way to learn German articles
description: er Die Das Swipe makes learning German genders fun and fast. The new version adds topics, progress tracking, widget support, and translations in more languages.

name: MCP Builder
tagline: Instantly create & deploy MCP servers from any API spec
description: MCP Engine is the fastest way to turn any OpenAPI spec into an MCP server that AI agents can actually use. Drop your spec, instantly get a Python repo, run it anywhere, or deploy in one click. 1,400+ MCP servers built so far and counting.

name: Radar
tagline: Generate and track keyword rankings
description: Radar is your all-in-one ASO tool. Track any app for keyword insights, generate keywords with AI, and monitor real-time rankings, competition, and trends. Manage multiple apps easily and get the edge you need to boost your App Store presence.

name: Risely AI
tagline: AI agents automating student success and retention workflows
description: Risely's AI Advisor instantly flags at-risk students, drafts personalized outreach in seconds, and rapidly creates intervention plans to help colleges improve retention and scale student support.

name: LinkedIn MCP
tagline: MCP server that lets AI assistants control your LinkedIn
description: MCP server that connects your LinkedIn account to AI assistants like Claude, Cursor, and VS Code. Ask them to search for leads, send messages, analyze profiles, and much more ‚Äì they'll handle it through our cloud browser, safely and automatically.

name: Cosmic AI Platform
tagline: AI-powered app development and deployment
description: We're excited to launch our all-in-one AI platform for content management and app development, featuring AI-powered content modeling, code generation, and seamless deployment pipeline‚Äîrevolutionizing the journey from concept to production.

name: NinjaDoc Ai
tagline: The document extraction API with coordinate-proof
description: Ninjadoc AI gives you structured data you can actually trust. Create schemas by asking your documents simple questions üí¨ Our API returns JSON with the exact coordinates for every single piece of data. Get undeniable proof of where the information came from.
